title: Typeface for information blurb
content:
Hello guys, could anyone suggest a beautiful typeface that would work well for the information part about your business.  
By this i mean (example)

adam tovey-designer  
 [www.adamtovey.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018052754/http:/www.adamtovey.co.uk/ "www.adamtovey.co.uk")  
London Studios  
Southbank  
LN6 D34  
Tel: 07771231232  
Email: [aj\_tovey@fsmail.com](mailto:aj_tovey@fsmail.com)

this will go on my letter heads and business cards. needs to be legible.clean and elegant.

I cant seem to find anything

hope you can help
author: adamtovey
